plain:
I can infer that the user likes movies that are:
- Historical (Braveheart)
- Dramatic (Once Were Warriors, The Shawshank Redemption, Forrest Gump, When Harry Met Sally, Good Will Hunting, Ordinary People, Rain Man)
- Action (Speed)
- Thriller (The Silence of the Lambs)
- Mystery (Rear Window)
- Comedy (That Thing You Do!, Cinema Paradiso, The Princess Bride, As Good as It Gets, Ferris Bueller's Day Off)
- Fantasy (Ponette, The Long Walk Home, Starman)
- Biographical (Kolya)
- Romantic (Romancing the Stone)
- Philosophical (Sling Blade)
- Science Fiction (Starman)
- Psychological (My Life to Live)

I can also infer that the user likes movies that are:
- Rated PG-13 or lower
- Runtime between 90 and 180 minutes
- Color
- Soundtrack with a variety of moods and styles
- Written with a variety of styles
- Visually interesting
